name: Yin-Yang - The Journey of Lost & Found
name_original: Yin-Yang - The Journey of Lost & Found
description:
Yin-Yang - The Journey of the Lost and Found is a 2 player local-multiplayer game about Yin & Yang which are Lost and need to find each other.  The goal is to reach the other player as soon as possible so they can refind the balance in life.

This project is a result of the 2021 GGJ.

Diversifiers used:

  • Get to the point - Your in-game artwork should be in a Pointillist style.
  • Moving the goalposts - The win condition of the game changes in some way each time it is played.
